Product.query: What are the key features of your Cloud Manager Pro service?
Product.expected_output: Cloud Manager Pro is our comprehensive cloud management platform designed for mid-sized businesses with growing infrastructure needs. It's priced at $149.99 monthly or $1,619.89 annually (with a 10% discount). Key features include: Advanced Monitoring, Smart Alerting, Cost Optimization, Automation Workflows, Multi-Cloud Support, 20 User Accounts. Can monitor up to 100 resources with email and chat support with a 12-hour response time.

Technical.query: I'm getting error E5678 when trying to deploy a container. How do I fix this?
Technical.expected_output: Error E5678 indicates a 'Container Image Verification Failed' issue. Steps to resolve: Check image integrity, verify signature configuration, review security scan results, check registry authentication. You can create a temporary exception in Security > Policies > Exceptions.

Billing.query: Can you check the status of order #ORD-12345?
Billing.expected_output: Order #ORD-12345: Status: Shipped, Order Date: September 10, 2023, Shipping Date: September 12, 2023, Expected Delivery Date: September 15, 2023, Item: Cloud Manager Pro (1 quantity), Total: $149.99.

MultiPart.query: I'm having trouble with the API integration and also want to know if there's a discount for annual billing?
MultiPart.expected_output: API integration: Provide specific issue details (e.g., error messages) for targeted troubleshooting. Annual billing: 10% discount on all plans, e.g., Cloud Manager Pro is $149.99/month or $1,619.89/year (saving ~$180).

Account.query: I need to add three users to my account. Can you help with that?
Account.expected_output: To add users: Log in to portal.techsolutions.example.com, go to Admin > User Management > Add User, enter email addresses, select roles, and send invitations. Cloud Manager Pro includes 20 user accounts. Additional licenses cost $99.99/month or $1,079.89/year.

General.query: I have a question about something I saw on your website.
General.expected_output: Please share more details about what you saw on our website. Was it related to products, pricing, technical specifications, or support information?

Advanced.query: I'm getting error E5678 on my Enterprise account deployment, and I also need to check if my recent order #ORD-56789 includes the new security module.
Advanced.expected_output: Error E5678: 'Container Image Verification Failed'. Check security scan results, verify signatures, or create an exception. Order #ORD-56789: Processing, includes Cloud Manager Enterprise ($499.99) and Premium Support ($299.99, with security features).

Advanced.query: I need to upgrade my team's subscription from Basic to Pro and add 5 new user licenses. Also, what's the status of ticket #TKT-12345?
Advanced.expected_output: To upgrade to Pro and add licenses: Go to Billing section, select Cloud Manager Pro ($149.99/month), and add 'Additional 10 Users' ($99.99/month). Ticket #TKT-12345 status is not available; please provide more details or contact support.
